solution_line_template: He has to read {total_goal} pages a week because {days_in_week} x {target_avg_per_day} = <<{days_in_week}*{target_avg_per_day}={total_goal}>>{total_goal}
He has to read {saturday_needed} pages on Saturday because {total_goal}-{total_read} =<<{total_goal}-{total_read}={saturday_needed}>>{saturday_needed}
